short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily access Minecraft news, music, servers, and more with a simple, organized interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Minecraft organizer for finding the most popular sources for Hosting, Tutorials, News, Music, Servers, and other related trendy information.

With the Minecraft Organizer you can request any MC-related website to be added to our tool, or bookmark it yourself, and create your specialized bookshelf with all of your favorite Minecraft links.
